mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_todo SET iplant = #{iplant}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, deadline_time = #{deadlineTime}, deadline_date = #{deadlineDate}, repeat_yn = #{repeatYn}
mapper.select: SELECT A.itodo, A.ctnt, DATE_FORMAT(A.deadline_date, "%m-%d") deadlineDate, date_format(A.deadline_time, "%H:%i") deadlineTime, B.nick_nm nickNm, B.nm, A.finish_yn finishYn FROM p_todo A INNER JOIN p_plant B ON A.iplant = B.iplant WHERE del_yn = 0 and A.deadline_date <= now() ORDER BY deadline_date desc

SELECT A.ctnt, DATE_FORMAT(A.deadline_date, "%m-%d") deadlineDate, date_format(A.deadline_time, "%H:%i") deadlineTime, B.nick_nm nickNm, B.nm, A.finish_yn finishYn FROM p_todo A INNER JOIN p_plant B ON A.iplant = B.iplant WHERE deadline_date = #{deadlineDate} AND del_yn = 0 ORDER BY deadline_date desc

SELECT A.ctnt, DATE_FORMAT(A.deadline_date, "%m-%d") deadlineDate, date_format(A.deadline_time, "%H:%i") deadlineTime, B.nick_nm nickNm, B.nm, A.finish_yn finishYn FROM p_todo A INNER JOIN p_plant B ON A.iplant = B.iplant WHERE del_yn = 0 AND finish_yn = 0 AND ( A.deadline_date >= #{sDate} AND A.deadline_date <= #{eDate} ) ORDER BY deadline_date

SELECT C.itodo, C.ctnt, C.deadline_date deadlineDate, DATE_FORMAT(C.deadline_time, '%H:%i') deadlineTime, C.finish_yn finishYn , D.repeat_day repeatDay , E.nick_nm nickNm, E.nm FROM p_todo C INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.itodo, group_concat(A.repeat_day SEPARATOR ',') repeat_day FROM p_day A INNER JOIN p_todo B ON A.itodo = B.itodo GROUP BY A.itodo ) D ON C.itodo = D.itodo INNER JOIN p_plant E ON C.iplant = E.iplant WHERE DATE_FORMAT(C.deadline_date, '%Y-%m') <= #{targetDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE p_todo SET iplant = #{iplant}, deadline_time = #{deadlineTime}, deadline_date = #{deadlineDate}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, repeat_yn = #{repeatYn}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE itodo = #{itodo}
UPDATE p_todo SET finish_yn = 1, finished_at = current_timestamp WHERE itodo = #{itodo}
mapper.select: SELECT B.ctnt, A.repeat_day repeatDay, DATE_FORMAT(B.deadline_date, "%m-%d") deadlineDate, DATE_FORMAT(B.deadline_time, "%H:%i") deadlineTime, C.nick_nm nickNm, C.nm FROM p_day A INNER JOIN p_todo B ON A.itodo = B.itodo INNER JOIN p_plant C ON C.iplant = B.iplant
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_todo(iplant, ctnt, deadline_time, deadline_date,repeat_yn) SELECT B.iplant,B.ctnt, B.deadline_time, current_date(), B.repeat_yn FROM p_day A INNER JOIN p_todo B ON A.itodo = B.itodo WHERE A.repeat_day = #{repeatDay}
